thread.title: Celebrity Sex Pod vanishes from Channel 5's schedule 'at the last minute'
thread.title_full: Celebrity Sex Pod vanishes from Channel 5's schedule 'at the last minute'

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Celebrity Sex Pod vanishes from Channel 5's schedule 'at the last minute'
text:
Celebrity Sex Pod vanishes from Channel 5's schedule 'at the last minute' Fans tuning in to watch the show were treated to a programme about Ant and Dec instead Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Celebrities reveal graphic details of their sex lives Share this video Get celebs     
The controversial show has been hitting headlines thanks to its very X-Rated content. 
But fans of Celebrity Sex Pod were left bemused on Thursday night when the latest instalment of the show disappeared from Channel 5's scheduel. 
The saucy show - which sees famous faces discussing taboo subjects with sex experts - was originally intended to run three weeks back-to-back, but its second outing was cancelled with just hours to go. Read More Marnie Simpson shocks TV viewers with VERY explicit comment about sex life with now ex-boyfriend Lewis Bloor Celebrity Sex Pod was scrapped from Thursday night's schedule at the last minute (Photo: Channel 5) 
The latest instalment of the candid programme was due to feature the likes of Chloe Khan and Ashley Cain. 
However, those expecting to see the reality couple revealing all about their sex lives were instead treated to the much tamer The Ant & Dec story. 
With the show raunchy show's future appeared to be far from certain, fans can breathe a sigh of relief as the Daily Star Online reports the next two episodes will in fact run. An episode starring Chloe Khan and Ashley Cain was replaced by a documentary about Ant and Dec (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Speaking to the website a show inside revealed that it had been moved to a prime summer slot, explaining: 
"I am under the impression because of the success of last week's show, and the normal Sex Pod series on 5Star, that the further two episodes of the celebrity version have been moved to a new slot towards summer." 
The insider added: "This would mean the remaining two episodes would fall alongside the channel's lead show Big Brother . 
"It would also potentially be to coincide with the launch of a new civilian Sex Pod series." 
The show found itself making a number of headlines, with the likes of TOWIE's John Clark, Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry, and Love Island star Katie Salmon talking about some very risque topics. Read More TOWIE's Jon Clark masturbated eight times in one day and kept his friends updated on WhatsApp The show has apparently been moved to a better slot in the summer, due to its phenomenal popularity (Photo: Channel 5) 
“My record of w**king is eight times in one day,” Jon admitted proudly on the last show, before adding: 
“I couldn’t touch my d**k for the next three days. It was a heavy day! [Usually] I reckon three to four a day, every day. If I’m super busy obviously I can’t get them in but I’ll always get one in before I go to bed, 100 per cent.” 
Charming. 
Mirror TV has reached out to a representative of Channel 5 for comment on the matter. Like us on Facebook
